Name: Silence In The Cabin
About the game: About 'Silence In The Cabin' is an Open Map Survival Horror Game, where you must survive Dark linear story sections in order to unlock more areas of the world. With gameplay heavily inspired by 'Resident Evil 7' and a tone more similar to 'P.T.' and 'Silent Hill'. Silence In The Cabin aims to be one Heck of a Horror Experience. What sets it apart from other indie games like it, is The Impressive visual quality, focus on dark Atmosphere, and Great Presentation. Combat is Hard, interesting and crucial to the gameplay formula. Collect weapons and important keys to expand the cabin property. Your goal is to escape before sunrise. The Future of Survival Horror 'Silence In The Cabin' is a completely free-to-play experience that will feature a Multiple Episode System along with Free and Paid DLC. With a focus on constantly Expanding over time, it will feel like a true Live Service. Stay tuned for more modes and expansions! Dev Note: This game is Currently in: Alpha 0.5 Made With Unity May require High end PC to play without frame drop
